metadata.title: CVE-2019-3852 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in moodle before version 3.6.3. Theget_with_capability_join and get_users_by_capability functions were nottaking context freezing into account when checking user capabilities

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
